data.name: Causa, Voices of the Dusk - Founders Soulember Kit
data.detailed_description:
Looking to support the development of Causa, Voices of the Dusk?

The Founders Soulember Kit is a special offer which will only be available during the Early Access of Causa. It includes:

  • 50 Card Packs.
  • 3,500 Organite (Crystals).
  • Unique Founders Soulember Banner.
  • Unique Founders Soulember Card Back.
  • 10 Avatars.



Each Card Pack includes 5 Cards of different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start building and upgrading your own decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.

Organite may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!

Add the unique Founders Soulember Banner and Card Back to your collection, and showcase them while battling other players. These items can only be obtained through this special kit.

Get 10 Avatars to collect, and pick your favorite to use!



This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 /10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-3225/AMD A8-7650K
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640/Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
